title: Mentor Coordinator
name: Sammy Eagen
major: Community Youth & Education Studies with a minor in Sociology
bio: Mentor Coordinators are responsible for mentor and administrative matters of the program. We are responsible for mentor applications trainings and bondings as well as addressing any matters amongst mentors/mentees incident reports and coordinating the weekly Steering Committee meetings.

title: Mentor Coordinator
name: Jill Cass
major: Environmental Science & Policy and International Development & Social Change
bio: Mentor Coordinators are responsible for mentor and administrative matters of the program. We are responsible for mentor applications trainings and bondings as well as addressing any matters amongst mentors/mentees incident reports and coordinating the weekly Steering Committee meetings.

title: Younger Girls Curriculum
name: Riley Buckjune
major: Community Youth & Education Studies with a minor in Studio Arts
bio: We work together as a group to create and facilitate the curriculum activities for every Saturday. We collaborate on ideas to provide effective and exciting themes and days for all of our members.

title: Younger Girls Curriculum
name: Sarah Krambeer

title: Older Girls Curriculum
name: Thea Mouzakes
major: English with a double minor in Community Youth & Education Studies and Studio Arts
bio: As older girls curriculum members we work with the other older girls mentors to create and organize activities for girls that are 13-16 years old. We help facilitate these activities on saturdays but a big part of older girls is collaboration between all of us.

title: Marketing and Outreach
name: Maire Geoghegan
bio: We work to recruit girls at the beginning of each semester. We maintain contact with families about program dates and updates and are responsible for registration forms and girls' attendance each week.
